items.content_html: Interactive Terminal Portfolio An interactive, terminal-style portfolio designed for showcasing experience and skills tailored for DevOps and SRE roles. This project replicates a lightweight Linux terminal interface, allowing recruiters to engage with your resume dynamically using real terminal-like commands.

items.content_html: Easy-Docs is a lightweight and intuitive real-time collaborative text editor designed for seamless document creation and editing. Built with modern web technologies, it enables multiple users to collaborate simultaneously with live updates. Documents are securely stored in the cloud, ensuring accessibility and persistence across sessions.
